'''Back With the Wind''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the [[Anemo Hypostasis]] in a single battle.

==Notes==
* The orbs can be gathered during its Meteor attack, which creates updrafts, or with the aid of [[Geo Constructs]].
** [[Venti]]'s Elemental Skill "[[Skyward Sonnet]]" can also be used to reach the orbs.
* The boss will need to perform two tornado attacks in order to create the ten orbs needed for the achievement.
